mapper.update:
UPDATE attenDay
id = #{id},
name = #{name},
timeStart = #{timeStart},
timeEnd = #{timeEnd},
hourStart = #{hourStart},
hourEnd = #{hourEnd},
minuteStart = #{minuteStart},
minuteEnd = #{minuteEnd},
proportion = #{proportion},
workDuration = #{workDuration},
remark = #{remark},
rangeArea = #{rangeArea},
tag = #{tag},
addDate = #{addDate},
addUser = #{addUser},
addIp = #{addIp},
modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate},
modifiedUser = #{modifiedUser},
modifiedIp = #{modifiedIp},
WHERE
AND modified = #{original}
